comment.realname: lifeasdaddy ...a guy, his wife, and their son...

comment._content: This photograph is in a series with other ones from this collection showing the athletes selected for the 1912 Olympic Games. See here: www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/2890283866/ and here: www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/2423488900/
